content:
Hi Folks, I've created a single channel (#Canada Core ) for us to discuss each of the three sub-streams that the Canadian Baseline Working Group is currently tackling. We can move to separate channels in the future if the group finds it helpful.

You can find our profiles on the CA-Core Github Repo and in the Canadian FHIR Registry on Simplifier.

Sub-stream leads; Shamil Nizamov (Individuals & Entities Sub Stream) and Igor Sirkovich (Medications) will be communicating days and times for the weekly profiling calls shortly and we'll update the Infoway Infocentral events calendar once times have been established.
